column3: Latest; Phnom Penh: According to preliminary reports
column4: a police vehicle of the 7 Makara Police Inspector was transporting two accused men to Prey Sar prison. When they reached the Stung Meanchey flyover when they jumped out of the car into the canal.------This incident caused alarm at 8 am on May 3
column7: Phnom Penh.------Immediately after authorities began hunting for the escaped men.------By 9 am the same day
column8: one of the accused men was recaptured and the other remains on the run. ------FAST NEWS------UPDATE: The other man was reportedly recaptured in or near City Mall.
